name: Laser die thing
description:
A little game made for the GMTK game jam of 2022 whose theme was « Roll of the dice ». You are a die on a grid. Use the arrow keys to move and WASD to attack from your die's sides. You can destroy the numbers when the attack's digit matches your target's.

This game was made by me and a friend, in the Godot engine, in two days.
